app_title: NLUI MCP - Natural Language User Interface
app_description: Natural Language User Interface Framework powered by Model Context Protocol
main_subtitle: Building intelligent interfaces with Model Context Protocol
error_404_description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
error_500_description: Something went wrong on our servers. Please try again later.
error_403_description: You don't have permission to access this resource.
error_400_description: The request could not be understood by the server.
error_default_description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
help_description: Explore and learn how to use NLUI components with interactive examples and code snippets
help_page_description: Learn how to properly configure and use the Natural Language User Interface
help_usage_description: To use NLUI, you need to provide configuration parameters in one of the following ways:
help_url_params_description: Add the 'nlui' parameter to the URL with a JSON string containing the configuration
help_session_storage_description: Store the configuration in sessionStorage under the 'nluiProp_[sessionId]' key, where sessionId comes from URL parameter
render_error_description: The UI component could not be rendered properly. This might be due to invalid configuration or missing data.
table_no_data_description: There is no data to display in this table
list_no_search_results_description: Please try searching with different keywords
list_no_data_description: There are no items to display in this list
audio_not_supported: Sorry, your browser does not support the audio element
video_not_supported: Sorry, your browser does not support embedded videos
demo_description: Experience the power of Natural Language User Interface
demo_input_placeholder: Enter your requirements, e.g.: Create an employee information table
error_validation: Input data validation failed, please check your input
error_network: Network connection error, please check your network settings
error_api: API call failed, please try again later
error_render: UI component rendering failed, configuration may be incorrect
error_config: Configuration error, please check related settings
error_permission: Insufficient permissions to perform this operation
error_unknown: An unknown error occurred, please contact technical support
doc_component_chart_description: Chart components provide powerful data visualization capabilities using ApexCharts library, supporting various chart types like line, area, bar, pie, donut, and more.
doc_component_calendar_description: Calendar components provide interactive event scheduling and date management using FullCalendar library, supporting monthly, weekly, and daily views.
doc_component_timeline_description: Timeline components display events along a vertical timeline using FlyonUI styles, ideal for activity feeds, milestones, and process tracking.
doc_component_gallery_description: Gallery components create image and video carousels with thumbnails, navigation controls, and various display options using FlyonUI carousel styles.
doc_component_card_description: Versatile card components for displaying structured content with optional actions, images, and various layouts.
doc_component_table_description: Feature-rich table components with sorting, filtering, pagination, and action buttons for data management.
doc_component_form_description: Comprehensive form components with validation, various input types, and customizable layouts for data collection.
doc_component_image_description: Optimized image components with lazy loading, responsive sizing, and fallback support.
doc_component_video_description: Video components with controls, autoplay options, and responsive sizing for multimedia content.
doc_component_audio_description: Simple audio components with standard controls for playing audio content.
doc_component_markdown_description: Markdown renderer components that convert Markdown syntax to formatted HTML with syntax highlighting support.
doc_layout_description: NLUI provides a 5-area layout system (header, footer, left, right, main) for creating complex page structures with flexible content organization.
layout_enterprise_description: A complex enterprise dashboard with navigation header, sidebar, main content area, and status footer.
layout_nested_description: Demonstrates nested layouts with multiple content areas and complex organization.
layout_simple_description: A clean three-column layout with left navigation, main content, and right sidebar.
layout_navigation_description: A layout focused on header navigation with main content and footer information.
layout_feature_nesting_desc: Support for nested layouts within layouts
try_layout_example: View this layout example in a new window
example_card_basic_body: This is a simple card component demonstrating basic content display with a clean layout.
example_card_product_body: Features, pricing, and specifications for our latest product offering.
example_card_team_body:
John Smith
Senior Software Developer
Experienced in full-stack development with expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies.
example_card_status_body: System is running smoothly. All services are operational.
example_card_product2_body: Powered by the advanced A17 Pro chip, featuring professional camera system and titanium design. Starting from 128GB, with 5G network support.
example_card_ai_body: Based on the latest GPT technology, providing 24/7 intelligent conversation service to help you quickly handle various questions and needs. Multi-language support.
example_card_report_body: This month's sales increased by 15%, 1,234 new user registrations, and user activity increased by 8%. Excellent team performance!
example_card_maintenance_body: The system will undergo routine maintenance upgrade from 23:00-01:00 tonight. Some functions may be unavailable during this period. Please plan your work in advance.
example_card_course_body: React full-stack development practical course, from basics to advanced, including project practice. Suitable for learners with some JavaScript foundation.
form_placeholder_improvement: What features would you like to see improved?
help_footer_tagline: Smart UI component solutions for modern web applications
layout_complete_enterprise_description: Showcases a complete layout structure containing five areas: header, footer, left, right, and main
layout_nested_structure_description: Demonstrates that the main area can contain a complete layout structure again
layout_simple_three_column_description: Common layout with left navigation, main content area, and right toolbar
layout_header_navigation_description: Simple layout with top navigation and main content area
